title: UIF EEG Subset – PhysioNet BCI2000 Motor/Imagery (Prepared for RSIPP/CHREM)
description: Subset manifest, provenance, and derived coherence metrics for EEG data used in the UIF Companion Experiments (Papers I–IV). Raw EEG is NOT redistributed here. This folder provides manifests, checksum verification, and exact source links to PhysioNet (eegmmidb v1.0.0).

creators.name: Stuart E. N. Hiles
creators.affiliation: Independent Researcher, Unifying Information Field Project

provenance.citation: Schalk, G., McFarland, D.J., Hinterberger, T., Birbaumer, N., & Wolpaw, J.R. BCI2000 EEG Motor Movement/Imagery Dataset (v1.0.0). PhysioNet. doi:10.13026/C28G6P
provenance.primary_resource: Goldberger AL et al. PhysioBank, PhysioToolkit, and PhysioNet. Circulation. 2000;101(23):e215–e220. doi:10.1161/01.CIR.101.23.e215

license.name: ODC-By 1.0 (source dataset)
license.note: This repository does not re-host raw EEG data. Only derived metrics and manifests are shared here under CC BY-NC 4.0.

access.instructions: Download raw EDF files directly from PhysioNet (DOI above). Use subset_manifest.csv to reproduce the exact selection used in UIF experiments.

reproducibility.notes: 1 s windows; channels C3,C4,Cz; sampling 160 Hz; eyes-open/eyes-closed/task; UIF coherence R mapped to R∞, λᴿ, k. Metrics parallel those used in the quasar-coherence analysis.
